embed.description: Welcome to the Zero To Mastery Server. It's never easy arriving in a new location, so I am here to help you get caught up and feeling like home. Try typing `-help` to learn how to use the Zero To Mastery Discord world

fields.name: Support Channels
fields.value: Once inside the Zero to Mastery Server checkout `#welcome`, `#how-to-use-discord` and `#music-bot-commands` channels for more help.

fields.name: Still Really Confused?
fields.value: Why not drop a message in general chat asking for help, someone will be more than happy to assist you. You could also reach out to one of the Management team for help.
